Articles.Content:
For those who haven't heard of, SimplePlanes is a simple plane-building game with a selection of plane parts and weapons. Construct you own plane, put it up on their official site, and download other's planes.

Their fuselage parts and are procedural, with selections for their size, corner type, and slope. You can modify the amount of fuel it has, the mass, and the buoyancy.

The wings also are, and they can be extended to insane sizes. The dihedral can be edited as well. It can also carry fuel.

There are 3 prop engines, 5 jets, and 1 VTOL core.

 

I can request a mod that does this, better if it were a stock addition.

Eh, I wouldn’t want this in the stock game. When all shapes can be achieved with one part there is not much challenge in building.

As for mods, I’m pretty sure this already exists in procedural wings and procedural tanks.
I don't know how i feel about this being stock, it feels not much stock, using simpleplanes blocks, but it would be a mod that is quite easy to make however.

This is not going to happen in Stock for sure I think. Procedural parts would replace all te stock fuselages, or their function. 

For a mod it's pretty cool. We already have Procedural Parts mods en B9 Procedural wings, but extra tweakables are always cool.
